name: Lab Rats (shoze)
description:
A short quest - help a couple of lab rats escape.

control 2 rats with one controller

controls:

best played with game-pad.
it's playable with keyboard but not ideal, if ur trying the html version do it on firefox.

credits:

art and game design - Galit Weisberg
programming - Majd Abdulqadir
sound - Rob Neubauer

done during adventure jam 2018 - a 2 week game jam. 

game is a bit buggy but playable
feedback is appreciated.
'#AdvJam2018'
#adventure
